meanings.definition: A class of proteins found in the retina that are sensitive to light and responsible for color vision.
meanings.sent1: The iodopsins in the retina help us see different colors.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study iodopsins to understand how we perceive color.
meanings.sent3: The iodopsins in the eye had a party and painted the world in vibrant hues.
meanings.sent4: Her vision was a canvas, painted by the iodopsins with every shade imaginable.
meanings.sent5: The rainbow appeared vivid and magical, thanks to the iodopsins in her eyes.
